# shadowOffset

**Instance Property**

The offset of the shadow the mask creates.

## Declaration

```swift
var shadowOffset: CGPoint { get set }
```

## Instance Properties

- **maskImage**: An image that defines the shape to use when disintegrating from the source to the target image.
- **shadowDensity**: The density of the shadow the mask creates.
- **shadowRadius**: The radius of the shadow the mask creates.
